issue.message: This call is to a method from API 16, the call containing class androidx.room.CoroutinesRoom is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 16. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(16) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(16).

This call is to a method from API 16, the call containing class androidx.room.CoroutinesRoom.Companion is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 16. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(16) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(16).
